subject: Handle tool_call/tool_result events in SSE chat UI
description: packages/web/src/app/(dashboard)/chat/page.tsx:165-188: SSE client only processes text_delta and error. API streams tool_call/tool_result/message_complete, so tool calls/results are dropped and tool-only responses render as empty. Add handling for tool_call/tool_result and end-of-message to match WS UI behavior.
